name: drinks-api
body:
#drinks-api

  A dead simple RESTful web service built on [node](http://nodejs.org).
  
## Features

  * Drink Specials
  * Taxi Information
  * Bar Information
  
## Users

  * Get Down in B-Town Mobile Web app

tagline: A dead simple RESTful API for drink specials, bar information, and taxi information for Bloomington, IL.  Built on node.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
